DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_OPORTUNIDADE_FUNIL
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 CASE TEMPERATURA
 WHEN 1 THEN 'FRIA'
 WHEN 2 THEN 'MORNA'
 WHEN 3 THEN 'QUENTE'
 WHEN 4 THEN 'MUITO-QUENTE'
 WHEN 5 THEN 'FECHADO'
 END AS TEMPERATURA,
 SUM(VALORTOTAL) VALOR,
 CASE TEMPERATURA
 WHEN 1 THEN '#5C9BD1'
 WHEN 2 THEN '#F4D03F'
 WHEN 3 THEN '#E35B5A'
 WHEN 4 THEN '#D91E18'
 WHEN 5 THEN '#26C281'
 END AS COR
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE TEMPERATURA IS NOT NULL AND MONTH(DATAFECHAMENTO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
GROUP BY TEMPERATURA
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="TEMPERATURA" From="A" Path="TEMPERATURA" /> <DecimalField Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
